name: DOLPHIN HUSTLE
description:
Somewhere in the wastelands of the ocean lives a young dolphin.
He likes to get high and hang out. All he does is hang out.
But it so happened that the cyber Internet sucked him in.
It's time to end this.

The goal of the game is to complete the level, not get trapped and get to the computer.
Control the mouse to move around. Get to the computer to go to the next level.
Be careful not to fall into traps, such as red crosses or flying discs. Collect cards if you are interested in them.

- interesting levels
- webpunk gameplay
- cool music
- unusual design
